ACS.JO.summary: Acsion Limited engages in property holding and development activities in South Africa. Its investment portfolio includes nine retail properties, including two regional shopping centers. The company develops regional shopping centers, community centers, convenience centers, neighborhood centers, and residential development projects, as well as industrial/commercial properties. Acsion Limited was incorporated in 2014 and is based in Centurion, South Africa.

BWN.JO.summary: Balwin Properties Limited develops and sells residential properties in the low-to-middle market segments in South Africa. The company offers sectional title apartments. It also operates as a fiber network infrastructure provider of electronic communication services; and rents electronic communication products. The company was formerly known as Balwin Properties Proprietary Limited. Balwin Properties Limited was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Johannesburg, South Africa.
